fulltext:
Nguyen Thac Minh Tuan                                                
  Nguyen Thac Minh Tuan 
| Email:  
        November  7th 1993 
         | Cell:  
EDUCATION 
PHUONG DONG UNIVERSITY  
August 2011 – June 2015 
  Degree of Banking and Finance  
 INTERNATIONAL ENGLISH TESTING LANGUAGE SYSTEM       (IELTS) 
 Band : 7.0 
 PROFESSION SKILLS 
•  Over 4 years of experience working in the sales field. 
•  Over 2 years of working in B2B sales as well as managing own business. 
•  Able to work under high pressure environment with high expectations. 
•  Strong at communication in both mother and native languages. 
•  Willing to learn and adapt to new fields of working and knowledge. 
•  Proactive and positive mindset. 
PROFESSIONAL WORKING EXPERIENCE  
GRANITE AND MARBLE CONSTRUCTION 
            November 2017   -  Now   
Founder- Sales 
Description: A startup of constructing granite and marble and trading building accessories. 
Responsibilities: 
•  Connecting with contractors for small to medium sized construction 
•  Maintaining relationships with contractors, customers. 
•  Selling building accessories for retail and wholesales 
•  Managing working time of workers 
•  Handling issues arising on construction site 
•  Keeping track of cash flow. 
•  Supervising constructing progress and quality 
Key Achievements:  
•  Open a retail store in March 2019 
•  Successfully finish over 50 constructions from small to medium sized such as civil houses, 
apartments, villas 
•  Cooperating with other contractors to finish 2 big constructions which are The  
Big Lecture-Room at Ba Vang Pagoda and HDI Tower 
GENIEE INTERNATIONAL PTE 
            April 2017   -  March 2018 
Sales  
Description:. Geniee is a leading company in SSP platform and DSP from Japan with years of 
experience. In early 2017, Geniee extended to a new branch of business which is direct sales. 
Responsibilities: 
•  Finding new customers. 
•  Learning and developing new products based on market demands. 
•  Checking and controlling quality of campaigns 
•  Due to the limitation of recruitment for the newly opened business, taken charge of operation for some 
campaigns for Facebook ads and Email ads for several campaigns. 
Key Achievements:  
•  Successfully ran a massive campaign which was the opening of Ciputra International City at 
September 2017 
•  Negotiated and managed over 30 small to medium campaigns. 
TSUBAME E-TIME VIETNAM 
            January 2016 - April 2017   
Sales 
Company Information: Tsubame E-time Vietnam is a branch of a Japanese Organization with 
over 50 years of doing car services in Japan. In 2015, the company started investing in Vietnam 
to develop a brand of Electric bike. 
Responsibilities: 
•  Sales Electric bike product from the company to agents in the given area. 
•  Contacting, taking care of old customers, finding new customers. 
•  Preparing contract, documents for agents, distributor. 
•  Interpreting meeting and sales discussion for Japanese Director 
•  Negotiating with oversea customers in English. 
Key Achievements:  
•  Fully understanding about mechanical parts and technical equipment of the products which are 
Electric Bike. 
•  Successfully negotiated with over 10 agents in Northern Vietnam. 
ENGLISH TUTOR (Part time job) 
October 2015 - February 2017    
Responsibilities: 
•  Teaching and guiding students to achieve the desired scores in IELTS from band 5 to 6.5. 
•  Motivate and deliver the passion of loving English inside student’s minds. 
•  Finding and preparing resources for teaching. 
•  Enhancing the knowledge as well as mental attitude of students. 
Key Achievements:  
•  8 students achieved 5.5 band in IELTS and one got 6.5. 
•  Raise the love of English for over 20 peoples throughout 2 years of teaching. 
•  
Good communicating and teaching method gained after a short period of time 
 SIDUS Joint Stock Company 
November 2014 – June 2015  
Salesman and Manager Assistant 
Company Information: The Company mainly focuses on making and distributing Shirt to big 
enterprises all over the Northern of Vietnam with its main customers are Lotte, Vinmart and 
Aeon. The most well-known product is shirt under the brand SOMIVIET 
Responsibilities: 
•  Take charge of assisting in hunting high-profile customers as well as keeping the relationship 
with old customers. Source customers throughout all media (Internet, personal relationship, 
etc.) . 
•  Set up meetings and interpret when dealing with foreign customers, mostly by English. 
•  Successfully found and set up deals with many big enterprises such as Dabaco in BacNinh as well 
as Vinmart in Ha Long. 
Key Achievements:  
•  Closed many deals generating over $15000 in sales revenue.  
•  Set up over 10 meetings and conferences. 
EXTRA CURRICULUMN 
TRAINING 
Academic English Course Level 6/7 - ACET 
SKILLS   
Languages: Vietnamese (native), English (advance) 
     Technical skills: Windows, MS Office, Outlook. 
     Facebook Ads 
REFERENCES  Mr. Hiroshi Miyagawa - Sales Manager of  Tsubame E-Time Vietnam: 01293171778 
Mr. Uchida  Yohei 
    - Director of Tsubame E-Time Vietnam : 0948198297 
Mr. Nguyen Cong Son  -Director of SIDUS JSC: 01666666685

educations.major_categories_detail: Tài chính – Ngân hàng – Bảo hiểm
